A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler
 
addToCenter(Component) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
a protected void method to allow the inheriters to add gui components to the center it recieves a gui component and adds it to the center of itself.

B

ButtonsHandler() - Constructor for class ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler
 

C

cancelButton - Variable in class ClubAbstractEntity
cancelButton - if pressed it will perfom a rollback
centerPanel - Variable in class ClubAbstractEntity
centerPanel - a JPanel to contain the elements in the center
ClubAbstractEntity - Class in <Unnamed>
ClubAbstractEntity is an abstract class needed for the abstract entity of the program.
ClubAbstractEntity() - Constructor for class ClubAbstractEntity
Parameterless constructor - initializes the gui container component which is needed for each new entity in the system.
ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the ButtonsHandler - used to wire the "okButton" and "cancelButton".
clubbers - Static variable in class NightClubMgmtApp
clubbers - The ArrayList of the clubbers
commit() - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
Used after the validation process ended succesfuly.
commit() - Method in class Person
this function writes the information into our database after the validation was successful.
commit() - Method in class Soldier
commit simply calls the father's Person.commit() which writes the text fileds to the actual data base.
commit() - Method in class Student
commit simply calls the father's Person.commit() which writes the text fileds to the actual data base.
createEntity(int) - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
Private mehtod used to create a new entity.
createGenericRow(String, JTextField, JLabel) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
This protected method is used to create a row within a container.
createGenericStrikeLabel() - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
Protected method to create a new strike label, paint it to red and sets its visible to be false.
createGenericTextField(String) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
Each and every generic text field is defined the same for all the inheriters, therefore this method was created, to make it easy to add new textfield that will stay consistent throughout the system.

E

existsValidate(String, String, ClubAbstractEntity) - Static method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This public static method is used to validate the existance of an entitys id/studentid/personalnum using the existing implemented abstract method ClubAbstractEntity.match(java.lang.String) of each inheriter of @{link ClubAbstractEntity} [Person.match(java.lang.String),match(java.lang.String),Soldier.match(java.lang.String)]

F

findClubber(String) - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This method is used to find a clubber by a key given to it it uses each clubbers ClubAbstractEntity.match(java.lang.String) method.

L

loadClubbersDBFromFile() - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
Loads the clubbers from file via ObjectInputStream and FileInputStream, will cast the readen object to arraylist of ClubAbstractEntity.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class NightClubMgmtApp
main function simply creates a new NightClubMgmtApp to get the application start running.
manipulateDB() - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
manipulateDB - used to control the searching mechanism.
match(String) - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
abstract method to control the matching machanism after Searching for an entity - returns true if found and false if wasnt found.
match(String) - Method in class Person
A function that tells us if a given string is equal to the id of the person which tells us if he is in our database
match(String) - Method in class Soldier
This method is responsible for the searching and matching (id and personal num)
match(String) - Method in class Student
Match- will tell us if a given key matches this students actual ID or his StudentID (starting from the 5th index).

N

NightClubMgmtApp - Class in <Unnamed>
NightClubMgmtApp - this class contains the main.
NightClubMgmtApp() - Constructor for class NightClubMgmtApp
empty constructor - will initialize the clubbers array afterward it will load the clubbers from the file via NightClubMgmtApp.loadClubbersDBFromFile() method.

O

okButton - Variable in class ClubAbstractEntity
okButton - if pressed it will validate the data via ClubAbstractEntity.validateData()

P

Person - Class in <Unnamed>
The Person class - this class represents the ordinary person's fields.
Person() - Constructor for class Person
empty constructor that call the actual 4 parameters constructor with empty Strings so that all the gui components will be made.
Person(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Person
The constructors job is to initialize every gui component of the persons data and sends them to the center of the parents window via ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component) It also uses the ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericStrikeLabel(), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericTextField(java.lang.String) and ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericRow(java.lang.String, javax.swing.JTextField, javax.swing.JLabel) method to make the constructor more organized and keep the consistency of the design.
personalNum - Variable in class Soldier
personalNum - The Soldiers personal number
personalNumField - Variable in class Soldier
personalNumField - The text field that holds the personal number

R

rollBack() - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
rollBack is invoked if we started to add an entity and wanted to go back.
rollBack() - Method in class Person
this function controls what happens when we hit cancel it writes the previous valid values into the textfields
rollBack() - Method in class Soldier
This method is used for pressing cancel while changing a soldiers information if cancel was pressed nothing should be saved - therefore this method is invoked and makes sure that that the valid data that is already in the database will be set back to the text fields.
rollBack() - Method in class Student
This method is used for pressing cancel while changing a students information if cancel was pressed nothing should be saved - therefore this method is invoked and makes sure that that the valid data that is already in the database will be set back to the text fields.

S

Soldier - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends Person and inherits all of the basic fundementals of a person.
Soldier() - Constructor for class Soldier
Empty constructor - uses the 5 parameter costructor to initialize an empty entity.
Soldier(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Soldier
This 5 parameter constructor calls the parent constructor for initializing the basic Person field, than it initializes the rest (using: ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericStrikeLabel(), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericTextField(java.lang.String), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericRow(java.lang.String, javax.swing.JTextField, javax.swing.JLabel))
soldierStrike - Variable in class Soldier
soldierStrike - the label that was premade for the strikes
strikes - Variable in class Person
strike - an array for storing the strikes labels ("*") indexed the same as the values as well
Student - Class in <Unnamed>
Student - this class extends the Person Class.
Student() - Constructor for class Student
empty constructor that uses the 5 parameter constructor for initialization of a new empty entity.
Student(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Student
This 5 parameter constructor calls the parent constructor for initializing the basic Person field, than it initializes the rest (using: ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericStrikeLabel(), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericTextField(java.lang.String), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericRow(java.lang.String, javax.swing.JTextField, javax.swing.JLabel))
studentID - Variable in class Student
studentID - actual studentID
studentIDfield - Variable in class Student
studentIDfield - Textfield to hold the ID
studentStrike - Variable in class Student
studentStrike - label for showing the error if the validateData() failed.

T

textFields - Variable in class Person
textFields - this field is used for the fields which are indexed in the same order of the values.

V

validateData() - Method in class ClubAbstractEntity
abstract method to be implemented in the inheriters of this class.
validateData() - Method in class Person
a function to control the validation if the database values, it helps us to maintain a consistent database where every value inside it is valid(using String.matches(java.lang.String) and Pattern-regular expression patterns).
validateData() - Method in class Soldier
This method is used to validate the fields of the soldiers window.
validateData() - Method in class Student
This method is used to validate the fields of the students window.
values - Variable in class Person
Values - an array that holds all the values of the person: values[0] - id, valued[1] - name, values[2] - surName, values[3] - phone number.

W

wireHandlers(JButton, JButton, JComboBox<String>) - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
This private method wires all the handlers to their gui components using anonymous listeners: the add (invokes NightClubMgmtApp.createEntity(int)) and search (invokes NightClubMgmtApp.manipulateDB()) buttons and the window itself (using WindowAdapter, invokes NightClubMgmtApp.writeClubbersDBtoFile()).
writeClubbersDBtoFile() - Method in class NightClubMgmtApp
Writes the clubbers arraylist to file using ObjectOutputStream and FileOutputStream.
